sentences.en: A dry - cell powered photographic apparatus that holds and electrically triggers a flashbulb.
sentences.cn: 闪光枪一种装有并以电引发闪光灯泡的用电池供电的照相器材.

sentences.en: Actually even so-called 'flashbulb memories'—like where you were when Kennedy was shot—can be quite inaccurate or easily change over time.
sentences.cn: 事实上，即使是闪光灯记忆，就像你在肯尼迪被射杀的现场，也是非常不精确的，非常容易改变的。

words.tran_cn: 闪光的；瞬间的；俗丽的；暴躁的
发出闪光之物；闪光装置

trans.tran_en: A flashbulb is a small bulb that can be attached to a camera. It makes a bright flash of light so that you can take photographs indoors.
